column1: Andúrils sheath was the Gifts of Galadriel Galadriel bestowed to Aragorn.
Before the Fellowship of the Ring left Lothlórien
column2: Galadriel presented each of them with gifts. The first gift was given to Aragorn. It was a sheath made for his sword Andúril. The sheath was "overlaid with a tracery of flowers and leaves wrought of silver and gold
column3: and on it were set in elven-runes formed of many gems the name Andúril and the lineage of the sword." Galadriel told that "the blade that is drawn from this sheath shall not be stained or broken even in defeat."
